text:
Because of security reason, I rename /admin path to other. But, in the 
banner.jsp form(Commit Change and Logout button), action link to absolute path 
as "/admin/commitChanges.do" and "/admin/logOut.do". It should change to 
relative path as "commitChanges.do" and "logOut.d".
creator: lsomchai@yahoo.com

text:
You should submit a patch which fixes it. Otherwise, it doesn't look very high
priority for the Tomcat developers.
creator: remm@apache.org
lsomchai@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 2149
banner.jsp file that remove "/admin"

creator: amyroh@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17744 ***
